text: be’inezīyami āyihudawiyani beẖonuti layi bale t’ifirini hulu irimi āderegini፡፡ kekebiti፣ kefiyelina kebegimi morawochachewini jeribawochachewi weyimi ānijetochachewi yeteshekemuti weyimi be’āt’initi yetek’elak’elewi (sibi) sīk’eri benerisu layi irimi āderegini፡፡ yihinini be’āmets’achewi mikiniyati k’et’anachewi፡፡ inya iwinetenyochi neni፡፡
